description: Joint programme on Data for Development: The joint programme supports prepartion of the third Eritrean Demographic Health Survey, establishment of National Database.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Capacity improved and a system established within the NSO and sectoral ministries to conduct surveys, collect and disseminate data and update the national database.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Data for Development (D4D)

title: Data for Development (D4D)
